mapper.select: SELECT oi.order_no order_no , oi.order_id order_id , oi.order_dt order_dt , ol.order_prod_no prod_no , ol.order_quantity order_quantity , p.prod_name prod_name , p.prod_price prod_price , p.prod_price * ol.order_quantity as total FROM order_info oi JOIN order_line ol ON oi.order_no = ol.order_no JOIN product p ON ol.order_prod_no = p.prod_no WHERE 1=1 AND oi.order_id = #{order_id}
